1:
Yahweh, do not rebuke me in your anger
\q or discipline me in your wrath.
\q
2:
Have mercy on me, Yahweh, for I am frail;
\q heal me, Yahweh, for my bones are shaking.
3:
My soul also is very troubled.
\q But you, Yahwehâ€”how long will this continue?
\q
4:
Return, Yahweh! rescue me.
\q Save me because of your covenant faithfulness!
\q
5:
For in death there is no remembrance of you.
\q In Sheol who will give you thanks?
6:
I am weary with my groaning.
\q All night I drench my bed with tears;
\q I wash my couch away with my tears.
\q
7:
My eyes grow dim from grief;
\q they grow weak because of all my adversaries.
10:
All my enemies will be ashamed and greatly troubled.
\q They will turn back and be suddenly humiliated.
